name: Ash VS Tobias REMATCH
description:
I made this Pokemon Game in under 10 minutes just for FUN.

In this game, you play as Ash and your opponent is Tobias.

Your pokemon is Lucario (Mega Lucario) and Tobias has Darkrai.

Can Ash beat Tobias?

Lucario Moves are:

Press A for Aura Sphere

Press D for Force Palm

Enjoy!!!!!!!!!
